mapper.select: select counseling_no, manager_number, counseling_name, counseling_phone, counseling_email, to_char(counseling_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') as counseling_date, to_char (counseling_date,'hh24:mi') as clock from counseling where (counseling_name like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or counseling_phone like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or counseling_email like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or counseling_date like '%'||#{keyword}||'%') order by counseling_no desc
mapper.insert: insert into counseling values(( select nvl(max(counseling_no),0)+1 cnt from counseling), ${manager_number}, #{counseling_name}, #{counseling_phone}, #{counseling_email}, to_date(#{counseling_date},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi' )
mapper.update: update counseling set counseling_name = #{counseling_name}, counseling_phone = #{counseling_phone}, counseling_email = #{counseling_email}, counseling_date = to_date(#{counseling_date},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') where counseling_no = ${counseling_no}
